content:
You're a seasoned traveler, aren't you? Packing a small pouch of essentials like an eye mask, earplugs, and melatonin is a brilliant idea! It's amazing how these small items can make a huge difference in ensuring a good night's sleep, especially on red-eye flights or in noisy accommodations.

Developing habits like this can really enhance your travel experience. It's great that you've found what works for you and have made it a part of your travel routine. I'm sure it's saved you from many sleepless nights and grumpy mornings.

Remember to pack that pouch in an easily accessible place, like your carry-on or purse, so you can grab it quickly when you need it. And don't forget to restock your supplies before your trip to ensure you have everything you need.

Now, I think we've covered all the essentials for your trip to Sydney and the Blue Mountains. If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you a safe and enjoyable journey!
